CustomField.formula: IMAGE(CASE( Appt_Verification__c , "Approved", "/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "Rejected", "/img/icon/custom51_100/redcross16.png", "No phone or mobile on user address", "/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "Please check all Appt Verification boxes", "/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", "/img/msg_icons/error16.png") ,"Verification Flag")
CustomField.label: Verification Flag
